name: Super Quantal Mech Beast Grampulse
effectText:
2 Level 3 monsters
Cannot attack unless it has material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it. This is a Quick Effect if this card has "Super Quantum Blue Layer" as material. Once per turn: You can attach 1 "Super Quantum" monster from your hand or field to this card as material.
